channel.title: Help with Adding godsword stance to A Custom godsword
channel.description:
Hey guys, I'm not sure if this is the right section, so please if it is wrong section move it. I need help with adding a Godsword Stance to my custom Godsword sin client. SilentCJ said something about The Annimation, Server Side, though i wasn't quite sure what he meant. If anyone can help please do so.
The source I am using is the Stealthscape source by stealth king.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 29, 2009, 12:00:20 am[/size][hr]If the Source I'm using doesn't work can someone tell me a source that WILL let me do it Please.?

item.title: Help with Adding godsword stance to A Custom godsword
item.dc:creator: @Diamond_Pk Diamond Pk
item.description:
@Diamond_Pk wrote:

In class20 just as CJ at SilentCJ@hotmail.co.uk

Read full topic
item.source: Help with Adding godsword stance to A Custom godsword
